title: Metacognition-Based Advanced Science Concept Project Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational science concepts and basic digital device usage skills
context.additional_context: Learners in managerial/leadership roles within organizations explore scientific approaches to solving social issues through smartphone-based collaboration. Designed to systematically acquire complex concepts via personalized learning strategies.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the core principles of advanced scientific concepts (e.g., energy conversion, ecosystem interactions) by utilizing metacognitive strategies.
Learners apply metacognitive skills to systematically plan, monitor, and evaluate the scientific problem-solving process in project-based tasks.
Learners improve learning outcomes by using smartphone-based collaborative tools to provide peer feedback and write self-reflection reports.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
